name: Joel Ekne
title: Full stack developer
bio: I was born 1999 and live in Malmö, Sweden. I am very interested in IT. The thing I like the most is programming but, I also like other Areas within IT like: DevOps, SysAdmin, Security, etc.
Right now I am doing a worktraining/internship at a company called Skäggbyrån. I want to have a job with nice people and learn more about IT.
I have spent a lot of time teaching myself and doing projects, so I am confident I know more than my job experience shows.

education.description: Programming in C# 1 & 2  | Collage Course | 15 HP
Database Systems - Undergraduate Level | Collage Course | 7,5 HP
Introduction to Artificial Intelligence | Collage Course | 7,5 HP

projects.title: Javascript Guide
projects.description: A text guide for someone to learn javascript that is new to the language. Written in swedish.

projects.title: Rosklide_ui_node
projects.description: A Web  UI written in node I made for my dad. It's an admin program for a music competition he runs.

projects.title: SkaggbyranCodeServer
projects.description: A server that lets users upload a front-end projects to save them or share with others. Written in node.

projects.title: Puppeteer_jobSearch
projects.description: A web scraper that grabs data from https://arbetsformedlingen.se/platsbanken/ based on what the users wants to see. Written in node.

projects.title: DB_Navigator
projects.description: A Wordpress plugin that lets you check on your Wordpress Database. Written in PHP.

job_history.role: Created a WebUI with HTML and CSS, also a RESTful API with Golang. The Database used was PostgreSQL. It was a small project I mostly worked on alone
Worked with wordpress to create websites and programmed in Javascript and PHP for Wordpress when required. Created my own Wordpress plugins and user their API.
